scripts.build: trash build && tsc -p tsconfig.json && tsc -p config/tsconfig.module.json
scripts.test: yarn lint && yarn unit && yarn check-coverage
scripts.cov: yarn unit && yarn html-coverage && opn coverage/index.html
scripts.docs: typedoc src/index.ts --excludePrivate --mode file --theme minimal --out build/docs && opn build/docs/index.html

scripts-info.watch: Watch source files, rebuild library on changes, rerun relevant tests
scripts-info.watch:build: Watch source files, rebuild library on changes
scripts-info.watch:unit: Watch the build, rerun relevant tests on changes
scripts-info.cov: Run tests, generate the HTML coverage report, and open it in a browser
scripts-info.send-coverage: Output lcov test coverage report and send it to codecov
scripts-info.docs: Generate API documentation and open it in a browser
scripts-info.docs:json: Generate API documentation in typedoc JSON format
scripts-info.release: Bump package.json version, update CHANGELOG.md, tag a release
